data.oai_dc:dc: The table contains data on phenotypes for all individuals (IndID). Columns Tarsus and Wing give tarsus and wing length in mm. F_Gen, FBroodID and Wline are the identifiers for the mother, the brood of rearing, the maternal line and the measuring session, respectively. Age280 is an age identifier that separates individuals below 280 days of age (Age280=0) and those above 280 days of age (Age280=1) at the time of measuring. F is the inbreeding coefficient. Sex is the sex of the subject (0=females, 1=males).
Birds|Ecological Genetics|Gene Structure and Function|Quantitative Genetics|QTL mapping
